abstract: The city’s comptroller, John Liu, and several unions hope to get help for people at risk of losing their homes.
snippet: The city’s comptroller, John Liu, and several unions hope to get help for people at risk of losing their homes.
lead_paragraph: Hoping to succeed where Washington has largely failed, New York City’s comptroller, John C. Liu, and six large unions plan to begin a campaign on Wednesday to press the biggest banks to do more to prevent foreclosures in the New York area.

headline.main: New York Presses Banks on Foreclosures
headline.print_headline: An Initiative Pushes Banks On New York Foreclosures
